result.purpose: Responsible for defining data models related to application management, including versioning, updates, notifications, and operator interactions.
result.architecture: The folder follows a domain-driven design pattern, encapsulating models that represent core entities and their relationships within the application management domain.

internal/domains/manager/models/app_vers.purpose: Defines the VersionEntity model for application version management.

internal/domains/manager/models/auth.go.purpose: Defines the OperatorEntity model for database interactions.

internal/domains/manager/models/generic..purpose: Defines a HistoryEntity model for tracking changes in an application.

internal/domains/manager/models/mandator.purpose: Defines the MandatoryUpdateEntity model for managing mandatory updates in the application.

internal/domains/manager/models/noti.go.purpose: Defines data models for notifications in the application.
